Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Model: VIGOR GK50 ELITE TKL KAILH BLUE
Part Number: GK50TKLB


Keyboard
Keyboard Interface: USB 2.0
Design Style: TKL
Palm Rest: No
Mechanical Keyboard: Yes
Key Switch Type: Kailh Blue
Keyboard Color: Black
Backlit: Yes
Dimensions: 354 x 140 x 33 mm
Type: Wired


Mouse
Mouse Included: No


OS / System Requirement
Operating System Supported: Windows 10 (or above)


Features
Features: CLICKY & ACCURATE
The Kailh Blue mechanical switches offer audible feedback and a precise feel with a 50gf clicky keystroke for every key press. 
COMPACT TKL DESIGN
The tenkeyless form factor provides a wider and larger space for your mouse swipes for the ideal gaming setup.
ERGONOMIC FLOATING KEYCAP DESIGN
The ergonomic high-low keycap design keeps your hands and wrists in a natural position reducing strain while gaming.
3 ADJUSTABLE KEYBOARD ANGLES
Create your favorite comfy wrist position at 3 different tilt angles with two keyboard feet.
TRAVEL DRAWSTRING BAG INCLUDED
The included breathable scratch-resistant drawstring bag allows you to travel effortlessly.
DETACHABLE AND DURABLE USB TYPE-C CABLE
Reduce the risk of cable wear and tear while gaming on the go.
RGB MYSTIC LIGHT
Light up the battlefield with millions of colors or approach with stealth with the lights turned off. Choose from predefined effects or synchronize lighting with the rest of your RGB setup.
Label: Teclado MSI Vigor GK50 Elite TKL LL
